评论详情: Bad fabric

评论概述: Wish they had heavier fabric options
评论详情: Measurements and product reviews very helpful for purchase decision! Good fabric, though light for winter wear. Wish there were more options for fabric. Easy to steam out wrinkles. Will repurchase in different colors.

评论概述: Mostly decent skirt but VERY cheap material
评论详情: The fit and style of the skirt is cute but the material is so cheap that it detracts from any positive attributes the skirt initially had. It is very similar to a paper thin swimsuit/athletic material and wrinkles almost immediately after being put on. I’m not going to return it but I would never buy it again and I would discourage anyone else from buying it in the future.

I have a big belly, big butt, and very wide hips relative to my waist, so I have a really hard time finding skirts that fit correctly. That being said, this skirt fits me so well! It falls a couple inches below the knee, and the way the waist is sewn it sits right where I want it instead of falling to my hips. I do wish the material was a bit thicker, but that is not a deal breaker in this case. It is thick enough and long enough to be appropriate for a workplace setting and not in the least bit sheer. Also, it has functional pockets - my cell phone was able to fit with room to spare. In short, it is pretty darn close to a perfect skirt, and I will definitely be buying additional ones!
Did not disappoint.  Love this skirt!
It looks and feels like a halloween costume
I wasn't expecting much when I ordered this skirt, but I LOVE it.  Super comfortable, very flattering and looks great.

The skirt arrived with a broken zipper. It was zipped up half the way with the coils separated above and below the pull tab. Further instruction refilled poor workmanship where they had stitched crookedly right over top of the teeth in the zipper. This was a Christmas present and now I will have to install a new zipper myself. I guess they don't have quality inspectors for workmanship anymore.
What a beautiful skirt, no need ironing it’s pretty much wash and wear. Beautiful material and flowers and vibrant colors.
I don’t have a picture with me standing..but I liked this skirt and got a lot of compliments! It’s not super cheap feeling, it’s thicker than I thought. I was happy with my purchase!

i can appreciate the pockets and how stretchy and comfortable the fabric is. however the fabric looks and feels way too parachute/sporty material than cotton, which i don’t really like. i also don’t really like  the way the skirt pleats and falls either.

the sizing is very accurate for western bodies, however the fabric is so thin, it's like the whole thing is made out of jacket lining or something. I will come back to edit when I've had time to assess durability.
Tjis skirt hangs beautifully.  I recently had stomach surgery & need to wear high-waisted skirts/pants.  This is very elegant.  Can't wait to be able to get out & wear it.

I really like the wide waistband, the hem length and the dark shade of the navy blue. Surprisingly, the recommended XXL size was too big in the waist and hips for my 5'9", 180 lbs. pear-shaped frame. I'm not going to reorder the skirt in the next size down, because I don't like the fabric. It's very shiny, which is too dressy for lifestyle. Returned it.

Nice basic skirt with pockets! Some previous reviews mentioned "a slight sheen" ... my skirt is not a "slight" sheen, it's definitely shiny. I'm working on losing weight, so the elastic waist and A-line accommodates my changing bulges well. It looks very good doing the "and it has pockets" twirl!
Much higher quality than I was expecting, given the price point, and fit was larger than the size chart had indicated, so it was easy to tailor.

Size was on point. It doesn't cinch like it looks like it should. Back half is elastic band so pretty stretchy. Also has a zipper that's completely unneeded due to the stretchiness of the band and the material. This skirt could really benefit if the flat waistband extended further to the back making the elastic part maybe 4-6 inches wide. Or skip the elastic band altogether and make it tie like a corset in the back. But it would need to be made of thicker more rigid material for that. It is pretty thin fabric. I feel like you can see my black undies thru it a smidge. But it's soft. Still a pretty cute skirt.
Fit as expected bases on the Amazon recommend size based on other clothing I bought.
Perfect fit! Sizing is accurate, plus stretch bands in back. Skirt isn’t see through, no light shines.10/10

评论概述: cute style, but thin and flimsy
评论详情: The style is really cute, but the material and stitching is thinner than expected.  This is fine in the summer months but then  the zipper broke after  a few months of use and could not be repaired.
I  ordered 4 skirts 3 of them were lovely.  This one was poorly made. The material felt like a windbreaker.  It had a big stain on the front. Stay away!
Liked the color had yo trade for one size down  original was huge. Love the purple hard to find the shade I wanted
Nice material and a good fit, reasonably priced!

I got this for my Oktoberfest outfit and it's absolutely perfect! The color is beautiful, it is incredibly comfortable, the waistband is stretchy, and it has awesome deep pockets. Couldn't recommend it more!
Love everything about this. Quality is awesome, the fabric is thick, but super comfortable and breathable. Fit is accurate, color is so crisp, pockets are actually a great size!
This was definitely less full than the pictures show, but it's so cute! I got them for my work uniform and honestly? Super cute! Has pockets too. Plus size friendly
It seems it was worn before! The tag was folded and detached from the skirt!

I honestly don't have much to say about this skirt except that I really love it. I wear it often and get tons of compliments, will be buying more in different colors in the future. I highly recommend. It's not tight and nor too long, its the perfect length for me.
If you want an elastic skirt that fits a woman under 5 feet tall and nearly hits your ankles, it's a good idea to check the size chart. It's a lovely skirt.
This is supposed to be a Christmas skirt. Orange and Olive Green are not the right colors!

It’s a cute, a-line skirt. I love the buttons, I just wish the material was different. It’s a brown black because I tried to pair it with a black shirt and they didn’t match. I changed the shirt so I could wear the skirt though.

Pretty simple black shirt. I like the button details, elastic in the back and the wide waist band. I'm 5'11 and it falls well below my knees, which is exactly what I'm looking for. Has a little weight to it, enough to wear without a slip, if so desire. Would recommend going down a size. The elasticity gives you room to accomodate a smaller size. Will repurchase in different colors.

Im very disappointed in this product. I purchased 2 of these skirts in different colors and washed them per instructions and both came outwith discolored patches. My daughter was very disappointed because she loved the style of the skirts. L
The fabric was thin and plastic-like. It reminds me of a windbreaker.

It's a strawberry skirt, it's flattering, and lightweight. There is not much more a person can ask for. You will receive compliments in this because it's adorable. There is a white lining underneath the skirt, but be warned, if you wear something dark under there, it will show through.
Very thin fabric. Not see through or anything but it just wasn't what i was expecting. Doesn't really hold it's shape and pleats well. Will be returning  Size was fine for me.

As a pre K. teacher Love the length, The kids told me they love the skirt it makes them smile. It was as pictured The fabric is flowy nice feel to it Washed really well I wear with my denim jacket. You can dress it up if you like. I am 5'5 and 180 ordered the xxl.

评论概述: The fabrics are not likely at all
评论详情: It’s to think very bad even you dry cleaning it will never work for the fabric to bad
Fits well and decent quality. I would suggest not buying this if you carry most of your weight in the middle.
not bad at all. the fabric does feel a bit cheap but still nice
This is my third skirt from Belle Poque ... I love them all.  I always get compliments every time I wear them.
Definitely a nice skirt. I did have to bring it in since nobody ever has skirts for skinny girls but in the end I made it work. My other problem was that then matieral felt very cheap
Very cute and classic skirt, I love wearing it. Great value for price, I got brown which was perfect not transparent but not too heavy. The shape is nice making my waist look nice.
Love the dress but was expecting stretchy cotton.
Love the way this fits and flows. Material feels a bit funky but nobody but me can tell
Thank you

Such a good skirt to have. I do recommend downsizing since they have an elastic band. I bought a skirt in my actual size and it's slightly too big. The quality is perfect and I enjoy how beautiful the colors are of this and the other skirts I have. Recommend this company for sure.
Very synthetic fabric is extremely lightweight and prone to wrinkling bad. Back doesn’t look as good as front. Fits okay.
Cute skirt, flares, a little wide, material very loud when moving

The fabric is very thin and the stitching is very uneven and poorly done. It feels like fabric for a pillow case or bed sheet, but even then my bed sheets are thicker fabric than this. I took a picture at the bottom where the fabric is folded over itself and you can still see it's extremely thin. It's a nice texture but not one that this type of skirt should have. I think I could probably rip it with my hands if I tried. Oh also the waist is too big for me but that was expected since most skirts don't fit my waist and I normally tailor them, but this skirt isn't worth it I'll just be returning it.
Surprised that the skirt was shiny and it felt and sounded like the "parachute" material of the 80's sweatsuits.

评论概述: Great style for my body shape.
评论详情: Came shrink wrapped. Difficult to get the wrinkles out. Love the skirt! Hidden zipper and pockets are a plus. Purchased several different colors.

I am 5'3", 225 lbs. and I ordered the largest size.  I normally wear 20W jeans.  This fit nicely. It came out of the packaging very wrinkled.  I ironed it, and it looks great.  It doesn't seem prone to excessive wrinkling once smoothed out.

I currently own and wear 4 of these skirts. Black, blue, red and green. They are all perfectly comfortable, fit well and the pockets are big enough to fit a switch in them. However! I will say that I got a yellow one at one point and it was completely see through. I was extremely disappointed. That doesn't mean they aren't worth it, just stick to the darker colors.

I am a plus-size woman so some skirts can make me look frumpy or big. The framing of the skirt not only conceals some of my weight issues, but is long and flowy which makes it perfect for our church or a nice date with hubby! Definitely recommend for all shapes and sizes. 💞
Waistband had no stretch and was too small so returned rayon or polyester fabric not similar to true vintage skirts- looked modern and cheap.
The material was cheap and it had a horrible smell. It was also very long.

While I think the skirt is very well made, and it is not see through at all, the fabric is weird and horribly thin. It feels like rain jacket material and is very noisy when you move. It does fit true to size, and is a good value. I just wish that a different fabric and a thicker fabric was chosen. There is no way you can wear this skirt in Autumn and Winter if you live somewhere that has four distinct seasons. I also do not like the button details, but I think that might be personal preference. They are easy to remove.
This skirt is perfect for my Militia costume. Light and doesn’t wrinkle. Fits perfectly
The fit is big and it doesn't  have a flattering fit

Oh my gosh! I had low expectations as lately a lot of clothes are not flattering on my post partum body. However, this skirt is AMAZING!!!Not only does it fit my body well (and has a stretchy waistband, Woohoo!), but it provides a perfect vintage look. The skirt is lightweight, and breathable which is VERY IMPORTANT during hot weather, and the best part is that it has real, actual, human sized POCKETS!!!  I bought the black polka dot, but I'm buying at least one more in green, and maybe another in purple, just for a splash of color.
Fit nicely, looks nice, only wore a couple times and a button popped off.
The fabric is little silkier than expected but it looks great. The back is elastic which  akrs the fit easy.

Let me start by saying the skirt fits perfectly it's made out of very nice medium stretchy material ,breathable but oh my God it smells like it was in a factory fire. The skirt just stinks, I tried throwing it in a load of clothes and it made all of the clothes stink. So right now I have it rolled up in a Ziploc bag soaking in Tied and I'm thinking about throwing in some baking soda. I'll update this if I get the smell out.

评论用户: doin that civic duty of reviewing
评论详情: The skirt is very cute. I got a medium and it fits perfectly! (5'2, ~120). it's a little thin, so it's ncie for warmer weather or with stockings in cooler weather. the pockets are huge. I can fit my Kindle paperwhite into a pocket with no issues!

I really want to like this skirt. The color is great and fits nearly perfect but the fabric is much thinner than expected. Thin enough my tattoo is visable through which I’m not comfortable with at all for a skirt I intended to wear for work. Better fabric, a liner, or a slip could work as improvents
I love the color  You can dress it up or down.

I absolutely love these skirts. There elastic so once you find the size that fits you, they are amazing. Light weight, pockets, easy to move in, and multiple colors or patterns to choose from. Personally, I own  over 13 different skirts from this company and am always excited when I see a new color or pattern come out.

I purchased this for work because I saw several reviews raving about the skirt and saying that they wear it to work or church. I purchased a 2X and the material feels and looks like cheap costume material. It kind of swishes against itself and sounds like a windbreaker jacket. I am typically a 2X in most items. I purchased a 2X, but it was sliding off. I probably could have gotten away with an XL or maybe even L. There is a super stretchy waist band. It has so much stretch that the skirt fell when my phone was in the pocket. The skirt came rolled up and severely wrinkled. I'm not sure if this is just from the packaging or if this skirt will wrinkle easily during wear and would need to be pressed. I'm returning it so I won't know, but it is food for thought.
It was a great piece for an Annie Oakley costume

评论概述: Wear this if you want to look unpolished
评论详情: No matter what I do, no matter how much I iron, this skirt gets unflattering wrinkles -- even when it's just hanging on a hanger by itself. The garment is made with polyester without the treatment that many polyester clothing items get to keep them unwrinkled.  I was hoping for a skirt that I wouldn't have to iron while going on a trip. I was wrong.  Do not buy this unless you want to look like an unpolished, frumpy dumpy mess.

Out of all the Amazon skirts I bought, this is by far my favorite. The vintage style sparks so much joy and is flattering with all my outfits. Definitely recommend! I ordered an XS and it was true to size.
It is very cute and flattering on all body types
Very cute, but was a little disappointed on how thin thr material was. I was afraid to use the pockets as I felt it would rip the fabric. It was very thin. Will be returning.

评论概述: Style is cute, fabric is noisy
评论详情: The style and cut of the skirt is super cute... however the fabric is loud and it sounds like I'm walking around a wind breaker or a tent.

评论概述: cute!! difficult to get into but fits really well
评论详情: it was a small struggle to wiggle it up past my hips, but other than that it’s great. i definitely recommend measuring your waist to find the right fit because i did so and it fit perfectly. It’s a nice length, i think it was a pretty good price!! it’s decent quality, and it doesn’t feel terribly cheap.
I loved this skirt the fit was great

评论概述: Zipper came broke but I NEEDED it the day it came
评论详情: Zipper was broken. Beautiful and worn with safety pins. Pricing was reasonable. Lining is extra soft. Can be worn to multiple events. Preforms well.  Would be easier to use if zipper wasn’t broken.
The shiny material made it feel cheap and look cheap, length I wanted it over my knee, not to my ankle: the elastic in the back was a turn off for me
Feels the same as workout shorts and is loud kinda like a wind breaker. I never ended up wearing it for the event I bought it for because of the cheap feel and look 👀

评论概述: Fabric feels very cheap for the yellow one
评论详情: The fabric feels like a Halloween costume cheap fabric, the yellow color is actually see through if you wear dark underwear. Also the fabric wrinkles easily, the wide elastic band on the back of the skirt looked a little funny for the yellow color, kinda feels like a 50s diner waitress skirt if you choose to get the yellow one. Maybe the dark color is better than the yellow one I got  according to other reviews.

It’s great because it’s the lightest skirt you’ll ever wear. But it’s likely because it feels like it’s made of the same material as costumes. It feels like plastic and doesn’t drape super well. It works, but I wish I invested in something higher quality in the end.
I love the vibrancy of this shirt. It's soft and comfortable. It's lightweight but gives comes off as a classic. I am satisfied with my purchase.

I am 5'1 and 124 lb's I i got it in size S in color black. I  love the fit and style of this skirt. But the material is more like a water repellent material, makes a lot of swishy sounds. I gave it to my sister since I wouldn't wear something like this.
Fits just like the picture shows. Good size pockets. Nice, lightweight material. Amazing elastic and cute buttons. Love this skirt!

评论概述: Well made although it makes your bottom look huge!
评论详情: I wanted to like this skirt. It is cute when you see it. It appears well made with a lining. But it makes your buttocks look much larger than reality. I did return it with no problem.
Very poor quality.  Fabric was light as a feather and very cheap looking.  Definitely NOT WORTH THE MONEY….
The feeling of the fabric has a lot to be desired. The length of the skirt also could be longer.

The black skirt I originally ordered was so good. It was thick and double lined. I just reordered a pink skirt and the material was not the same at all. This is honestly ridiculous. Over 30 dollars for a thin material that’s not double lined. Where can I buy a skirt like the first one they sent me?? I bought a medium, I am 175 lbs, the measurements given are accurate.

The fabric could be a little heavier. I would love to see invisible zippers on the pockets. I ordered a small and it was too loose on my 28 inch waist. I took in a couple of tucks on the back elastic.
Fabric is cheaper looking than expected but still cute. Might just be the color I picked though.
I love this skirt! It fits well, is very cute, and comfortable. I also love that it does not seem to wrinkle and it’s easy to wash and dry.
Fabric very thin and see through, oversized waste, cheaply made,  good color

评论概述: It works, but not what I expected.
评论详情: It looks fine. It's fairly comfortable. The pockets are a HUGE plus. My main complaint is that the fabric is so THIN. It's not sheer or anything, just excessively light. It feels kind of cheap, and it's definitely not for fall or winter wear. If you went out in strong wind, you'd better tie weights to the hem.
I purchased this skirt based on the size chart, and I can't wear it. When I put it on, it looks like I'm wearing a trash bag and is not very flattering at all.
Skirt runs small..
Me gusta como queda.

Great skirt overall. There is an elastic band in the back that helps give the perfect fit and doesn't feel like it's digging in. It's a nice, flowy, comfortable skirt. There is also a zipper on the side, but I have not needed to use it. The buttons are decoration, but I assumed that when I bought it. The fabric is your usual polyester skirt, so it feels pretty cheap  (also has that characteristic sound when you touch it) and pilled very quickly in one area (on my side), but I can shave those off. I've worn it a few times now and I am very happy with it. Although, for the price you may be able to find a better quality material skirt.
True to size. I paired this with a tucked in snug red sweater, 40's style shoes, and a string of pearls for a retro look. I got so many compliments on this look. It was perfect!!
Really enjoyed wearing this cute skirt to our 50s sock hop dance. I’m looking forward to wearing it with a band t-shirt and boots this summer! The buttons are really cute.
